Edges-Chi Master -- Male Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Ailin': -1 vs. fatigue; critical failure inflicts Ailin'+
Superior Kung Fu (Tan Tui): Rise from prone costs no movement
Skills (16 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Focus: (spi) d4 Science: (sma) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 16; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (10 points): Arcane Background (Chi Master); Celestial Kung Fu; Martial Artist; Superior Kung Fu (Drunken Style); Superior Kung Fu (Eagle Claw); Superior Kung Fu (Mantis); Superior Kung Fu (Monkey); Superior Kung Fu (Shuai Chao); Superior Kung Fu (Tan Tui); Superior Kung Fu (Wing Chun) Hindrances: Ailin'; Jealous; Lyin' Eyes; Vengeful Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Combat
Parry: 7 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Native Armor Shield: None Weapons: Bola (d8+d1 R4"); Colt Navy (2d6 R12"); Double-Barrel Shotgun (3d6 R12"); Unarmed
Combat Notes:
Celestial Kung Fu: +1 Edge Points (Superior Kung Fu style); use 2 styles at once
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Martial Artist: +1 Unarmed attack/+1 Unarmed damage step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Lyin'Eyes: -1 Gambling (poker and faro)/-1 Intimidation (lies)/-1 Persuasion (lies)
Superior Kung Fu (Drunken Style): Trades -2 Pace for foes -2 attack
Superior Kung Fu (Eagle Claw): Hands become heavy weapons with AP 4
Superior Kung Fu (Mantis): Makes foe distracted or vulnerable after failed attack 1/rd
Superior Kung Fu (Monkey): Gives +2 Parry; may make Athletics test on all adjacent foes as one action
Superior Kung Fu (Shuai Chao): Gives free grapple attempt after failed foe attack
Superior Kung Fu (Tan Tui): Gives +1 unarmed damage step 1/rd, success knocks back 1d4" (Raise 1d4+2")
Superior Kung Fu (Wing Chun): Gives +1 Parry and foes -2 melee damage
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Deflection: (3 PP) R6" Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 5 rd
Empathy: (1 PP) R6" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2) for 5 rd (Spirit neg)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R30" Creates sound up to shout or R6" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Chi Master): 3 Powers/15 Power Points/Critical failure causes fatigue/Power range reduced to self or touch
